lead_paragraph: Allies of Hillary Clinton, abandoning the standard Democratic game plan, are urging conservatives and liberals to band together against a singular threat.

headline.print_headline: Shift by Clinton Depicts Dangers in Rise of Trump
headline.main: Clinton’s Portrayal of Trump as Dictator Aims at the Left and Right

snippet: Allies of Hillary Clinton, abandoning the standard Democratic game plan, are urging conservatives and liberals to band together against a singular threat....
abstract: Democrats make clear shift in their attacks against Donald Trump, with Hillary Clinton and others arguing Trump is dangerously unstable figure and friend of foreign despots; change marks attempt to frame presidential race not in terms of ordinary politics but as fight of American values against dangerous despot.
